entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers early this evening. Clearing overnight. Risk of a thunderstorm early this evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light this evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Tuesday 25 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Showers. Low zero.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Rain showers beginning in the evening and ending overnight then 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60 overnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Tuesday 25 April 2023
